'''''Vinyar Tengwar 9''''' is the ninth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|8|10}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Galadriel" — Patrick H. Wynne
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "A Linguistic Review of ''[[The Treason of Isengard]]''" — Jorge Quiñónez
* "Notes Toward a Translation of 'Luthien’s Song'" — Patrick H. Wynne
* "Transitions in Translations: Danish Appendectomies" (column) — Arden R. Smith
